tgt_original: (27) LIV yo imu bhadra-cari-praṇidhānaṁ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā buddha vijānati yo'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha |

src_original: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 55 //  tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye // 56 //
tgt_original: LVI sarva-triyadhva-gatebhi jinebhir yā pariṇāmana varṇita agrā tāya ahaṁ kuśalaṁ imu sarvaṁ nāmayamī vara-bhadra-carīye |

src_original: kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān /  saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam // 57 //
tgt_original: (28) LVII kāla-kṛyāṁ ca ahaṁ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān saṁmukha paśyiya taṁ amitābhaṁ taṁ ca sukhāvati-kṣetra vrajeyam |

src_original: (Gv 436)  tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā /  tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kari yāvata loke // 58 //
tgt_original: (29) LVIII tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrāḥ tāṁś ca ahaṁ paripūrya aśeṣān sattva-hitaṁ kari yāvata loke |

src_original: tahi jinamaṇḍali śobhani ramye padmavare rucire upapannaḥ /  vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato abhitābhajinasya // 59 //
tgt_original: LIX tahi jina-maṇḍali śobhani ramye padma-vare rucire upapannaḥ vyākaraṇaṁ ahu tatra labheyyā saṁmukhato amitābha-jinasya |

src_original: vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabhya ta tasmin nirmitakoṭiśatebhiranekaiḥ /  sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena // 60 //
tgt_original: LX vyākaraṇaṁ pratilabhya ca tasmin nirmita-koṭi-śatebhir anekaiḥ sattva-hitāni bahūny ahu kuryāṁ dikṣu daśasv api buddhi-balena |

src_original: bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit /  ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam // 61 //
tgt_original: (30) LXII bhadra-cariṁ pariṇāmya yad-āptaṁ puṇyam anantam atīva viśiṣṭam tena jagad vyasanaugha-nimagnaṁ yātv amitābha-puriṁ varam eva |
